snippet: Americans for Prosperity may have spent big to help Republicans take control of Congress, but the group held a news conference Thursday to send a message to the party’s members: Don’t go back to the profligate ways of the Bush era.
abstract: Americans for Prosperity may have spent big to help Republicans take control of Congress, but the group held a news conference Thursday to send a message to the party’s members: Don’t go back to the profligate ways of the Bush era.

headline.main: Tough Love for Republicans From a Major Supporter
